titleStmt.author: Samuel Roberts

head.supplied: 116 SWANSTON STREET, ¶ Melbourne, ¶ Nov 3d ¶ 186 ¶ 6 ¶ Dr Mueller ¶ To SAMUEL HARTLEY ROBERTS, ¶ Sign Writer, House Painter, Decorator & Embosser on Glass....

div.p: P67/474, unit 381, VPRS 3991 inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS is annotated 'No 21' of 74 receipts covering materials supplied from the Botanic Garden for the Intercolonial Exhibition of Australasia, Melbourne, 1866-7, for which M was one of the Commissioners.

p.seg: Sign Writer, House Painter, Decorator & Embosser on Glass.

cell.p:
0
A mistake has been made in the addition; the correct total, '2. 6. 0', has been written across the columns and initialled [initials illegible].
